description:
It's cute, but I wish that it had a few improvements, like using adw circular buttons for movement or something, That it would be adaptive and work well on my phones and tablets (gtk and adw app frameworks make this relitively easy to do) and maybe consider adding a play mode where the enemies move even if you don't after x-amount-of-time.
The app icon also could use an update, the current one is confusing (my opinion), and doesn't tell a person scrolling by it what your game is really.
A long-term suggestion, consider adding 'themes' that just switch up the tiles the dungeon generates from to a few different options from 'asset-packs', this kind of feature is usually really easy to impliment (the packs would just all consist of diferent images for each part, with identical naming, all the theme option does is move packs around and re-start the app.)
